name: The October Game - Balancing (2x12" LP, CD & MP3)
description: The October Game return with their third album: Balancing. With a more modern, darker and more expansive sound, the band are on the best form of their career. Recorded with producer Jake Robbins (Sharks, Natives) the album features the single Built This Wall. Track listing SIDE A 1) Answers and Keys 2) We Built This Wall To Destroy It 3) November SIDE B 4) Rise and Fall 5) Not Important 6) Beg Cycle SIDE C 7) Trust No One 8) Trousers 9) I Hope You Got What You Wanted 10) Sneaky Beaky SIDE D 11) Labyrinth 12) Recover Instead of offering various options, we've decided to make a hand-numbered double 12" heavy-weight LP with a bonus CD and download code for one great price. The LP is limited to just 250 copies worldwide and is packaged inside a gate fold jacket. 07.10.13 SCY042

options.name: Balancing Bundle   Signed Artwork Poster   Back Catalogue Bundle
Balancing Bundle   Hand Written Lyric Book   Signed Poster & Back Catalogue Bundle
Balancing Bundle   Acoustic House Show   Signed Poster & Back Catalogue Bundle

name: The October Game - Limited Edition Signed A3 Balancing Poster
description:
A limited edition hand-numbered A3 Balancing poster. Signed by each member of the band. Number from 1-50.

These posters are delivered using a poster tube so that they arrive in the best condition possible.

name: The October Game - Greenbacks
description: Limited edition, hand-numbered CD version of The October Game's single Wildblood. The first single lifted from The October Game album 'Wildblood'. Greenbacks is joined by the previously unreleased track 'You Haven't Seen Me Change' and a live/acoustic version of 'Concrete' which was recorded in Nick's front room. Track Listing 1) Greenbacks 2) You Haven't Seen Me Change 3) Concrete (Live/Acoustic)

name: Scylla Records - Logo T-Shirt
description: The new Scylla Records logo on a lovely Gildan Softstyle t-shirt. Crisp and white. Wear with pride.

name: Scream Shout - Threads
description:
After 5 years away Scream Shout are back with a new full length album, "Threads". The new album takes a slightly different direction, it's more focused, more streamlined and more in your face. The album features the single "Over Over Out". The album comes in limited edition packaging, put together by ACDSleeve.

Tracklisting:
 1) Sister, You Don't Know What Rough Is
2) Young Bucks
3) Conductor, Conduct
4) A Hush & A Heavy Hand
5) A Great Roar
6) Threads
7) I Should Have Been A Pair Of Ragged Claws
8) Over Over Out
9) Hold 'Em Up
10) The Hardest Part
11) We Bake, We Sew

22.07.13

SCY039

name: Person L - The Positives (12" Double Vinyl)
description: Second album from Philadelphia's incredible PERSON L. 12 tracks of pop, blues, jazz influenced rock. This strictly limited UK & Ireland only packaging. Limited edition 2X12" vinyl in gatefold packaging available with clear purple splatter vinyl and white purple splatter vinyl. This WONT BE PRESSED again and is not available anywhere else in the World. Disc 1 (side a) 1. Hole In The Fence 2. Good Days 3. The Positives Disc 1 (side b) 4. Goodness Gracious 5. New Sensation 6. Stay Calm Disc 2 (side a) 7. Sit Tight 8. Loudmouth 9. Changed Man Disc 2 (side b) 10. Pleasure Is All Mine 11. Untitled 12. I Sing The Body Electric SCY016 16.11.09

name: Arms & The Man - Bloodjunkie/Pure Luck
description: Super-Limited edition (/50) CD version of the Arms & The Man double A-side single Bloodjunkie/Pure Luck made by Wild Animal Records. A few remain after the bands launch show, so pick up a copy quick! Tracklisting: 1) BloodJunkie 2) Pure Luck SCY043 08.06.13

name: Hello Lazarus - Moving Forward Over The Next Financial Quarter
description:
Recorded with producer Jake Robbins (Natives, Sharks) the EP is the bands most direct and engaging work to date. The EP is housed in hand made packaging from the awesome AC/DSleeve and are each individually numbered. You can pick which number you'd like from the drop down menu! Tracklisting
1) When In Rome 2) Get An Axe 3) Stallions 4) I Am No Explorer If you buy all three EPs this year, you'll receive a limited edition collectors box with the third one! Tidy! SCY036 22.04.2013

name: Person L/Francesqa - Split 7" (Limited Edition)
description: We're proud to release the split EP between Philadelphia's Person L and London's Francesqa. Strictly limited to 200 copies in the UK, this 7" black vinyl, complete with gatefold jacket features the following tracks: Side A: Goodness Gracious (Person L) Side B: Years (Francesqa) All orders will receive a download code which will allow a high-quality download of both tracks and an exclusive, unreleased track by each band. The download tracklisting is: 1) Goodness Gracious (Person L) 2) Years (Francesqa) 3) Lonely Home (Francesqa) 4) Seesaw (Person L) Released 30.08.2010 SCY017

name: Sleeping Lessons T-Shirt
description: Please note:- This is a pre-order. These t-shirts will be delivered in early 2013. Once you place an order you will be kept fully up to date on when to expect your t-shirt. New Scylla Records artist Sleeping Lessons have released their debut EP 'Cellar Door' and this snazzy t-shirt to match. Featuring a large back print and a simple 'SL' logo on the chest. This T-Shirt comes with a FREE Scylla Records CD compilation and digital label sampler, both will arrive with your T-shirt.

name: Out of Sight - Where Do We Go From Here?
description:
We're very proud to be able to re-release Out of Sight's debut album "Where Do We Go From Here?".

Out of Sight's debut album was recorded with PlayWork Productions (Four Year Strong, Valencia, Person L) and features the single "Hey! (Walk Away)" amongst the time pop punk anthems on the album. Presented in a beautiful digi-pack this album sees the band take great strides from their debut "Something Created By Belief".

Track listing
1) You Know What I Need
2) This Is What Livin' Really Feels Like
3) Hey! (Walk Away)
4) Where Do We Go From Here?
5) No Time Like The Present
6) Headlights
7) Let's Make Shit Happen
8) Sunshine
9) Hollywood Hearts
10) You're Not Walking Alone

- "Simply oozing in charisma" 9/10 - Rock Sound
- "You can do no wrong with 'Where Do We Go From Here?" - Alter The Press

SCY025

07.05.2012

name: Just Surrender - If These Streets Could Talk
description:
Just Surrender’s incredible debut album gets an official UK release through Scylla Records. “Layered dual vocals, brashly melodic guitars, melodramatic wit” – Kerrang! “A massive emo pop punk band with a heaviness built out of huge vocal harmonies” – Metal Hammer Track Listing 1) I Can Barely Breathe 2) Of All We’ve Known 3) Tell Me Everything 4) In Your Silence 5) Our Work Of Art 6) What We’ve Become 7) You Tell A Tale 8) Forgotten Not Forgiven 9) Is There No Truth In Beauty 10) She Broke My Heart, So I Broke His Jaw SCY005
Released 12.07.07

description: The debut album from Ollie Taylor is presented in a super limited edition hand-made CD format and is also available on MP3. Track listing 1. love 2. This Is Love 3. Stare 4. Remember This 5. Deep Down 6. Anymore 7. Wrapped 8. The Eyes That Follow 9. The Pyscho 10. No More Hiding 11. Pheonix SCY030 29.10.12

name: Scream! Shout! Say Nothing - The Animals Still Run This City
description:
The debut full length album from Hitchin's Scream! Shout! Say Nothing is finally here. Don't be fooled by the track listing, this CD is well over thirty five minutes of music! All presented in a full digipack case featuring beautiful artwork from Doug Capper.

Produced, Engineered, Mixed by Will McGonagle (Hell Is For Heroes) and Mastered by Pelle Henricsson (Refused, Poison The Well) this EP features incredible raw guitars, driving bass and vocals that turn from whispers to screams in a heartbeat.

1) When It All Goes Dark The Animals Still Run This City
2) Fulfil The Roles Boys... Fulfil The Roles
3) Einstein I Ain't
4) The River
5) Gimme Inner Peace Or I'll Mop The Floor With Ya

SCY010
Released 25.08.08

name: Various Artists - 40,000 Leagues Under The Scene
description: Brand new compialtion from Scylla Records featuring OUT of SIGHT, Just Surrender, Sincerely Monroe, Proceed, Apathy, Hey Falcone, Weaver At The Loom, Deaf Havana and many more. Limited to 979 hand numbered copies. (If you want a particular number, include it in the order notes and we’ll try our hardest to get you the one you like) Tracklisting: 1) Treading Water – Proceed 2) Medicate Myself – Just Surrender 3) Fan The Flames – Luke Leighfield 4) Buck Up, They’re Coming – Weaver At The Loom 5) In The Arms Of Failure – April Dead 6) Tank Destroyer – Hesters Way 7) Nightlife – Hey Falcone 8) You’ve Got Guts (Shame We’ve Gotta Clean Them Up 9) Oh Howard You Crack Me Up – Deaf Havana 10) Crisis Of Confidence – Something For Someone 11) One Day Son, You’ll Be A Star – Lost On Campus 12) Sound The Alarm – Isaywestealthistv! 13) A Final Goodbye – Kiss Kiss Bang Bang 14) Murder On The Dance Floor (Part 1) – Sincerely Monroe 15) Abandon – The Cedar Falls 16) Within Our Heart – Twentyfour Hour Affair 17) Cigarettes And Jam – Apathy 18) Race Against Pulsing Egos (Acoustic) – OUT of SIGHT All of this plus a secret track! Just as a clue – think ex Fleeing From Finales member! SCY007

name: P A R R O T
description: Believe it or not, this is the first ever Scylla Records t-shirt and part of a new series of bold and vibrant designs. This one features our good friend, the humble Parrot. The t-shirt is super soft, fits and feels amazingly. Every sale comes with a random Scylla Records CD

name: Flights - Eleven (Scylla 100 Club)
description:
For the first ever Scylla 100 Club we proudly present ELEVEN by FLIGHTS.

Bristol-based Flights follow up their incredible self-titled EP with the single Eleven. The single comes packaged in a hand-made digifile courtesy of the wonderful ACDSleeve and each 1 is individually numbered so all are unique. You can pick your favourite number from the list above. The release also comes with an exclusive Flights sticker, limited to 100 pieces too.

Track listing
1) Eleven
2) Self-Facillitating Media Node*
3) Home Alone 5

*Exclusive to CD release.

Scylla 100 Club
The Scylla 100 Club will be allowing 100 people the chance to get their hands on limited editions of Scylla Records finest releases. Each release will be produced in a beautiful physical format and individually numbered. You will be able to choose your favourite number online, so you can collect every release with the same number or something else equally as cool. And as soon as you buy a Scylla 100 Club release we'll add you to a mailing list which will allow you to hear about (and buy) the next 100 Club release before anybody else!

SCY027

11.06.2012

name: Proceed - The Claudia Collection
description:
Your first chance to preview Proceed’s Scylla Records debut in May 2008. Features “It’s Just Another Hiding Place” from the Mini Album “Seven Months And A Fire Blanket” and two demos from the band. Limited to 50 copies.

1. It's Just Another Hiding Place 2. The Bitter Pill (Demo) 3. A Day In The Life (Demo)

name: Person L/Weatherbox Split EP
description:
THIS IS A PRE-ORDER. THESE RECORDS ARE EXPECTED TO SHIP TO YOU ON OR BEFORE FEB 14TH. IF THERE IS A DELAY IN MANUFACTURING, WE WILL LET YOU KNOW IMMEDIATELY.

ALL COPIES COME WITH A DIGITAL DOWNLOAD CODE

It's been rumored since 2008, and now, it finally exists: Philadelphia's Person L and San Diego's Weatherbox each contribute two brand new tracks to this split 7-inch. This release showcases Kenneth Vasoli and Brian Warren as true masters of their craft, in a constant game of post-punk one-upmanship. Essential listening that is worth the wait. 

Scylla Records is distributing the release in the United Kingdom on behalf of Youth Conspiracy Records who can be found at http://www.youthconspiracyrecords.com and we highly suggest you check them out if you're a fan of great music on beautiful vinyl.

TRACKLISTING 
A1: Person L - OK
A2: Person L - Winter Clothes 
B1: Weatherbox - Kickflips For Weeks 
B2: Weatherbox - Two Seductresses

PRESSING INFORMATION 
Blue /200 Worldwide  (we initially have 4 copies but more MAY be available)
Orange /200 (we initially have 4 copies but more MAY be available)
Black /100 (we initially have 2 copies but more MAY be available)

2) Shame On You

name: Out of Sight - Exclusive Album Sampler
description:
The first taste of Out of Sight's album "Where Do We Go From Here?" which will be released later in the Summer. This sampler is made up of two tracks from the album plus the video for lead single "Hey (Walk Away)". All packaged professionally, no CD-Rs here! There are ONLY 500 samplers being made, most will ONLY be available on the bands UK tour with We The Kings and Hey Monday. We are making 100 available online. AFTER THEY HAVE GONE THEY WILL NOT BE AVAILABLE AGAIN!

Tracklisting
1) Hey (Walk Away)
2) This Is What Living Really Feels Like
3) Hey (Walk Away) MUSIC VIDEO

SCY013
Released 25.05.09

name: Proceed - Seven Months And A Fire Blanket
description:
Proceed's very long-awaited debut mini album is finally released on Scylla Records. Produced by Justin Hill and Dan Weller (Sikth, Johnny Truant) Seven Months... sees Proceed blend glorious pop hooks with brutal metal riffs.

Featured on Bruce Dickinson's (Iron Maiden) BBC Radio 6 Show

"A hit on the dance floors of rock clubs across the country. Without any doubt one of the finest melodic-hardcore albums to have be released in recent months" Scene Slut Magazine.

"Proceed are one of the best bands in ages. 9/10" Street Voice Magazine.

1) Treading Water
2) The First In A Long Line
3) It's Just Another Hiding Place
4) To Infuse Thought Into The Otherwise Thoughtless
5) Now Laughing
6) Swemo
7) Telescopes

SCY009
Released 01.09.08
